nlacp: A public health agent (PHA) selects a specific time period for which he or she would like to see a detailed listing of all adverse events related to prescription drugs  or immunizations  or to see trends in adverse events relate to prescription drugs  or immunizations .

pred.subject: public health agent
pred.purpose: see trends in adverse events relate to prescription drugs or immunizations
